review_text: Super unique place to stay! Great location for walking to restaurants, trails to bike, walk and run.
Very unique. So peaceful! Very roomy! Love the tall ceilings!

Eric and Cheryl’s place is very unique. We arrived late at night and the church big and overwhelming. Once inside it was absolutely beautiful and comfortable. We visited for a graduation and it was central to every direction we needed to go. The kitchen was wonderful and they allowed us to have a few people over to have cake to celebrate my daughter. The space was perfect before heading to dinner. The kitchen was fully stocked. Beds are very comfy.
I’d still rate this home a 5, but it was quite dirty. A lot of dust and cobwebs. The floors were very dirty and there was a load of bedding in the dryer. We had to use the washer and dryer while we were there because we have a small child that got very dirty, otherwise we wouldn’t have noticed the full dryer.
Hosts were quick to respond to everything except when I requested a credit of money paid for booking and canceling bc of an emergency. I was able to rebook and fulfill the reservation but they didn’t honor my request or follow up.
Beautiful place!

Eric and his wife were fantastic hosts. The place was truly incredible and exactly what we needed. This historic church is renowned in the community, and it holds special significance for my family, as they had worked on it during its time as the 'Hope House.' It was heartwarming to discover that many of our family members had contributed to the place when it served as the Hope House. The space was incredibly comfortable and perfectly suited for hosting a large family dinner. Every guest who joined us was astounded by the renovations and the effort put into restoring the place. We are sincerely grateful for this unforgettable experience.
awesome place to stay!

Everything was exactly described, and the spot was truly stunning. We really enjoyed this unique location, and appreciated the attention to detail from Eric. Check out was a breeze and the expectations for us were straight forward. We will definitely be recommending this location to friends and family, and really hope we have the opportunity to stay here again!

It was super cool to spend Christmas in a church. It really added something extra to the holidays! It was a very clean, updated, unique. The town is awesome so that was a bonus! Would definitely go back!
Very clean and unique. Spacious!
Great stay! Very unique and special location, made for a wonderful family get together!
2nd time staying here. It was just as perfect as the first! We LOVE everything about this old church. Can’t wait to come stay again!!
Beautiful church restored to great place to stay. Clean, accommodating, and relaxing space.
Such an interesting place to stay! One of our group remembers performing in piano recitals in this space in the 1960's. Beautiful, well-appointed, very clean.
The Hosts were very prompt addressing any issues we had and I appreciated that! THANKS!
Beautiful inside!! I can’t wait to stay here again!
The “church” is great, very unique. Everything described is true, I would have preferred another deadbolt on the front door though.
Beautiful home! The house was stocked with everything we needed. Host was super kind and had great response time. This house was Even more beautiful in real life!
Great, clean, and extremely unique place to rest and relax. Super cool!
The church was beautiful and Eric was great to work with! Will definitely come back!
This historic church was stunning. Beautifully restored and comfortable inside. Easy to get to, and walking distance to Main Street attractions.

We had a restful stay in Ottawa, a lovely small town in Kansas 20 miles from thriving Lawrence. The place is just a couple blocks from a sweet downtown and a few blocks from a beautiful bike path. The hosts were responsive to our many questions as we settled in. The master bedroom and bath were spacious and comfortable. Being converted from a church allowed for a church-size kitchen with plenty of counter space. We enjoyed walking along beautiful old homes in the tree-lined neighborhood, going to a farmer’s market for fresh local meat, eggs, and vegetables, hiking miles of shaded bike path, and feasting on home cooked meals. It was just the R&R we needed. We recommend this getaway, and we certainly will be back!

We loved the peace and quiet of the place and the setting. It was a great escape from the hurry of life. It had all the modern amenities we needed for our trip and still maintained the charm and beauty of the historic building.

This place exceeded expectations. We are always on the hunt for unique places to stay and this place did not disappoint. Our crew was in awe at what had been done to the place and we would def stay there again!
Absolutely beautifully done!! The space was perfect for 4 people and had everything we needed to feel at home!!
The church is beautiful, the remodel is impressive and I would definitely recommend this place for anyone visiting Ottawa.
Very thoughtful and well done remodel of the space with comfortable amenities you would find in an upscale home.

Wonderful experience!!
grandkids love the loft !
Eric Wes very helpful and kind !

This is a very neat location in a historical building. There were local shops and restaurants that were walkable. The auditorium turned living room was perfect for visiting or playing games between trips out to explore.

What an amazing experience. Staying at the Victorian Gothic church was a thrill. Great location, walking distance to downtown and biking trails. Eric did a wonderful job renovating the church into a very warm and inviting place to stay. It was stocked with all the essentials you need it.

What an absolutely awesome place to stay. The inside of this old church has been turned into a luxurious palace. Our family loved every bit of it. Beautiful granite counter tops, walk-in showers, a very large living room, and even a loft with a bed. Such a wonderfully unique stay.

This place is absolutely beautiful. They did an amazing job with turning thos church into a gorgeous place to stay. We stayed under a co-workers name then I extended the stay in my name and Eric was awesome about the transition. Thank you so much Eric!

So happy we found this unique property for our stay in Ottawa! This historic church was comfortable and close to shops and eateries on Main Street. It was quite the conversation started with anyone walking by that saw us coming and going.
As we visit Kansas often, this will definitely be our choice for future stays.

Lara’s farmhouse is a reflection of a thoughtful and experienced host. Clean, charming, and well stocked for a comfortable stay, it was also more spacious than expected from the photos. Thorough written information provided onsite for every question & contingency. A relaxing and welcoming “home base” for our adventures.
Lovely updated home with lots of character. We really enjoyed the extra land with walk path as well.
Very restful, peaceful place to stay and enjoy the outdoors with a walking trail and fire pit.
Wonderful and charming place to stay!!
The house was amazing, the host was amazing, the amenities were awesome (snacks, water, ice, coffee) we will definitely be staying here in the future! This was our favorite stay by far!

Oh my! What a lovely, charming, cozy little farmhouse! We loved everything about our stay at Eleanor's farmhouse. We wish we'd had more time there. Truly a gem here on airbnb. Book it! You won't regret it. Thank you Lara for the loveliest stay!
Great place! Only stayed for one night but it was so cozy and perfect for what we needed!

The farmhouse was beautiful. The trail cut through the woods and farm was great for our family get out and explore! Lots to look at and lots of relaxing. The only downside was the squeaky bunk bed, our boys had a hard time getting to sleep if the other one moved a bit causing lots of noise. The only other issue (mostly for small kids) is the very hot furnace fireplaces that heat the house. To me they were very cool and worked great, our boys loved laying right in front and warming up! But for our 1 year old it was always a thought on our minds to make sure she was away from them. Overall the place was great and our family had a great time! We would rent again!!
A wonderful place to stay! So peaceful and quiet and the best host ever!
Nice country stay that isn't too far from stores. The family loved it!
It was a relaxing place to land for the evening. Comfortable beds and quality bed linens.
Thanks for letting us stay at your place! It was great!

Amazing!!! Every detail was awesome!!! Walked in for Christmas vacation and there was decorations everywhere and lights and even a Christmas tree!!! Very beautiful place and I felt like I was at home!!! Very responsive host who obviously put a lot
Of thought and pride into this place!! Best place I have stayed yet!!!
We enjoyed our stay here and would stay again. Exactly as described in the listing.
I was very impressed with Laura's place. The perfect combination of modern and rustic. Roomy, cozy, clean. Definitely plan to come back.
Lara’s place was perfect! A great getaway from town but also a great escape for an unfortunate visit to the area. Lara was accommodating and great at communicating! We can’t wait to stay again!
The farmhouse was lovely. It was a great place to unplug and relax for a few days.

This stay was exactly what we needed for our mom’s night out. It was so peaceful and beautiful. We enjoyed the trails, the fire pit and the cozy home. Lara was a wonderful host and easy to work with. We look forward to staying at Eleanor’s again!
What an awesome place! If you’re looking for a great quiet place to stay and connect with the people closest to you, look no further!
Awesome people, awesome place. All around, fantastic!
We had a wonderful girls night at the farmhouse! So peaceful and relaxing. Lara was a great host, quick with communication and willing to accommodate to any needs!
We loved the house, it was just as described, and Lara was quick with her responses. Her house is a great layover if you’re cycling the Flint Hills Trail.

Lara, the farmhouse was very inviting, clean and a wonderful place for us to stay at for our wedding of our kids at the White Barn. Very peaceful during our downtime. Thank you so much for making it a great experience.
Kim Gifford
Peaceful, private home in the woods! Laura was a great host.

Stayed there for a wedding near by. Easy to get in. Right off hwy, but still felt private. Lots of Amish going by in their carriages, pretty neat. Very nice place. Old and corky, but in the best possible way.

I originally was seeking to photograph sunflowers in bloom in Lara's fields. Was delighted to learn Lara has an airbnb right on her farm. Staying there took me back to my growing up on a farm in central Kansas.
Her accomodations were perfect for my needs. Sadly I was able to spend only 2 nights and 1 day, though I was able to get some good shots of Lara's sunflowers.
Best value for a great getaway! Sunflowers were perfectly in season and so close to the venue. A great place to unplug and unwind with family!
We had a wonderful stay at Eleanor’s Place. Clean, very cool in HOT weather, serene setting, helpful host and great sunflower field to visit! Perfect stay!

Eleanor's was a darling, inviting space. It was clean & serene. My family & I had a short stay. We wish we could have explored the grounds more. Lara was so great at communicating. We jope to go back one day. Highly recommend this space & this host!
Lara was a great communicator; the house was comfy! Air conditioning was great, beds were great, kitchen and coffee great too! The bunk beds were very squeaky... overall, great!!
Very cute little farm house. We loved the place!

We stayed for 3 nights and enjoyed being in the country and the coziness of the farmhouse. Lots of room for the 3 of us, and the house had everything we needed. The outdoor area was beautiful and I enjoyed birdwatching the grounds. Lara was very responsive and proactive. A great value, this place is a gem.

Lovely stay at this little Airbnb. Clean, cute, and the yard was so nice to hang out in. We played cornhole & ladderball; and made s’mores in the fire pit. If you’re looking for a weekend out of town or just passing through; it is definitely worth it to stay here. Lara was easy and quick to communicate with via the app.

Stopped through moving across the country. The property is very clean and spacious! A great place to relax and enjoy downtime with friends/family. Plenty of room for dogs to get exercise! Highly recommend this place!

I booked this house for me to stay with my bridesmaids before my wedding since our venue was only 10 minutes away. It was so cute and homey! We all loved it! Super peaceful, private, and the morning on the deck with our coffees was *chef's kiss*
Very quiet and cozy. Everything was very simple and clean!
A very cute, adorable place. Very pretty surroundings; felt more like being at home versus a noisy hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much and would definitely stay there again!
Loved everything about the stay.Nice to walk around and spend time on the porches.The house was really nice and comfy.

Very nice big house. Right next to a busy road so if you’re a light sleeper, you might want to bring ear plugs. I am not a light sleeper so I slept nicely. There’s a nice walking path on the property so that you can get some quite fresh air!
What a great place to unplug and relax. It’s a place you will want to go back to.
Very nice and quaint farmhouse. Bed was comfortable. We had everything we needed.

Our family of 6 ranging from 13 to 74 thoroughly enjoyed Eleanor's Farmhouse. Lara was quick to respond to my questions and provided local restaurant recommendations. The house was clean, tidy, and welcoming - Lara had even written our daughter a "Good luck at Regionals" (gymnastics) welcoming at the entrance! Talk about attention to detail! The accommodation was just as advertised. The kitchen and bathroom were stocked with everything we needed, and the appliances were in great working condition. We played games (provided), watched a DVD (many provided), and made smores around the firepit in the backyard. Everyone agreed the beds were cozy. We enjoyed walking the short path around the property. The garage was utilized for parking our vehicles when a sudden thunderstorm arose. We all relished the relaxation and togetherness the property provided! If ever needing to stay in the Topeka area again, we will definitely be back! Thank you Lara for being such an amazing host!
Lara is an awesome host. She and her house provided a perfect experience for my family and I. I can not say enough good things. We will for sure be back.
Celebrated a family birthday and had everything we needed, lots of space and comfortable

We had a lovely retreat at Lara's house following our daughter's college tour at Kansas State. The house was clean and comfortable and very private. Everything was as Lara described. We enjoyed doing a puzzle together and playing the games provided on the large coffee table. The only downside is that it's very close to the highway, which Lara aptly disclosed, but that made time outside a little less peaceful than we'd hoped. Not a huge deal, but something to keep in mind. Overall, a great place to reconnect and relax.
Most beautiful and homey place weve stayed

Lara was fantastic! So kind, flexible, and communicative. Loved the personalized welcome note also. The house itself was very charming and it was so cool to have a trail to explore on. Definitely will be back if we are in the area again!
We had our third stay at Eleanor’s Farmhouse this past weekend. And as before…the home and hostess were fabulous! Lovely, quiet getaway!
Stayed with two of my coworkers so we could have a short retreat away from the office for a planning retreat. Lara's place was perfect!

Loved this place!! We had a blast playing the board games that they provided. It was so nice to have no wifi, nice change of pace. Already thinking about coming down and spending a weekend in the summer so we can enjoy the fire pit.

Me and my family have stayed here twice now and both have even excellent experiences. I think the best part by far is the outdoors. Nice fire pit and love what they have done with the lights around the trees. Was the perfect peaceful getaway that we needed. They have tons of outdoor games available that are perfect to play outdoors by the fire. The inside is just as amazing & is super homey. We can’t wait for the next time to stay here. I would highly recommend. Lara is very responsive & made check in so easy!
Great stay, comfy and private

This was our 3rd stay ! We love it so much. Very peaceful and perfect for an early Christmas stay. We always have a wonderful time. We did puzzles, went for walks and spent quality time together. I would definitely recommend!!! Thank you again!
Well-stocked, exceptionally clean and cozy. Property is beautiful and great communication with the host. We came back again to stay and would be happy to stay in the future as well!

We celebrated "thanksmasnewyrs" a new family term coined by having Elenore's farm house available and accessible to get our nationally spread out family to. I hope to continue this new family tradition for years to come, thank you Lara for allowing us to start it at your place. Family pics were taken on your beautiful property and some of our best memories, to date, were made!

Lara is a wonderful host, very accommodating, we had a wonderful time and one day/night stay at Eleanor's Farmhouse. We definitely will be back in the future. very comfortable beds and awesome water pressure in the shower. the home is very peaceful and relaxing.
This was great place to stay. Close enough to the city but far enough away to give you a peaceful farmhouse experience. We would definitely book this home again.

Lara’s was a perfect place to stay to ride the Flint Hills trail. It was incredibly clean, tastefully renovated and beautifully decorated. The highway was only moderately noisy when on the deck but sleep was great. I would book again without hesitation.
Such a fun little place to plan a little getaway and relax!!!

What a great place to stay! Nicely decorated and very clean. We loved the fire pit and walnut grove on the property. The location was ideal, the highway wasn’t too noisy and you had a nice sense of being out in the country.
Had a wonderful stay at Eleanor's. Great getaway, very enjoyable and we loved the country feel. Would definitely stay longer next time.
We loved staying here! And Lara was so kind!!
Such a wonderful stay. Exactly what our family needed.

We so enjoyed staying at Lara's place. We had 3 couples that were in for the Country Stampede Music Event at Heartland Motorsports track in Topeka, KS and we really enjoyed the short trip to the track and loved being able to come back to a relaxing place to ourselves away from all of the energy at the track.

A lovely home and property for our girls weekend. Comfy living space and bedrooms. Great outdoor space for relaxing in the evening.
Lara's communication was excellent as well. We loved the info sent ahead to make sure we were prepared. And we took recommendations on local restaurants, which were also great.

Beautiful farmhouse with all the modern amenities needed for a country get away. Had a great time hosting a couple meals and some family fun in front of the bonfire area lit up with hanging lights and plenty of dry wood. Would recommend to anyone as a great place to stay or even for an event.
The epitome of the best for AirBnB. Everyone loved it
Great place to stay! With cute farmhouse decor and plenty of DVDs to choose from to watch some movies.

Such a peaceful property with beautiful trees, charming, clean interior, and felt far away from the city. Could not hear traffic inside the house. So quiet. Felt like a retreat! Great price/value also. Highly recommend!
This is such an adorable little farmhouse and so tastefully done!

Elenor’s was more than we expected! So cozy and clean and it had any amenity you may need! So quiet and peaceful! This location is perfect for families and guests of all ages! Lara was so helpful and quick to get back to us! We will for sure be back!
Clean, cute, quiet and plenty of space! Would definitely stay at Eleanor’s again!
This is not just Airbnb. You feel at home. What a beautiful clean place. My prayer is all who stay here will treat it as they would their own home. What a blessing!
Cute farmhouse to stay in on an i70 trip!

This was our second visit to Eleanor’s and we will definitely be back for a third! Eleanor’s is beautiful and has everything you would possibly need for a perfect getaway. It’s so nice to slow down, read, play games and put a puzzle together. If you are looking for a peaceful place for your next getaway look no further!

Loved it! Everything was so cozy and perfect for what I was needing. The only downside was the sound of the highway —but I knew going in what to expect because Lara did a great job warning about it in the listing. I hope to come back, again!

A quick and easy to get to destination to relax from city life. Beautiful space to see the stars. Interior is roomier than it looks. Every amenity and little perk is right where you need it. Very comfortable with all the right fixins! A great and clean stay.
A very nice place to stay, we really enjoyed our time

This is a lovely old farm house that has been updated to make it very comfortable. It is well supplied with all the basics and then some. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would select this property again if in the area.

A wonderful place to stay, we enjoyed it so much my wife said that she could see us living there! Lara was super responsive and helpful when I had a couple quick questions during our stay. Would absolutely book again for an easy getaway.
We loved it! The space was clean and very homey. Would definitely come back!

Lara was a super host! Just walking in the house you already feel welcomed. Our family wanted a getaway & this was the most perfect place to stay to recharge. Beautiful house & was very clean! I definitely recommend this place and I would definitely stay here again!

This is our second stay at Eleanor’s Farmhouse and it was just as welcoming this time around. The small and thoughtful touches add to the peaceful and cozy ambiance. Lara is a wonderful host and we highly recommend this place for a peaceful getaway!

Eleanor’s Farmhouse is the perfect little country getaway. It was my songwriting retreat for a few days. Cozy and comfy. Took me back to childhood being there, it felt so familiar. I slept like a baby.
Lara is a wonderful host.
I’ll be back!
Great communication, really cool spot, clean and all the essentials were provided, in addition to some extras that made it all around a comfortable and relaxing weekend away!

We were extremely thankful to stay at such a beautiful place! Everything was sparkling clean and welcoming. The house has great updates that still preserve its original character. Clearly, Lara has put a lot of love into this home.
Our kids were thrilled with the toys/games inside and loved to run around outside. We all loved the private walking trail and campfire area.
Lara was very welcoming and communicated in a professional and timely manner.
Cannot say enough good things! We highly recommend Eleanor’s Farmhouse and will be back!

Thanks for the great place to stay while we were back from Georgia for Christmas. It was nice being by ourselves for a few days! Loved the stoves and the house was much nicer than you would expect for an old farm house once you step inside. My wife and I loved it.

My girlfriends and I stayed here for a quick weekend getaway. Our stay at Eleanor’s farmhouse was wonderful! The home and property had much to offer and the welcoming and thoughtful finishing touches made us feel right at home. It was comfy and cozy and the perfect spot to get away from the daily hustle and bustle! Highly recommend and would definitely visit here again!

This beautiful farmhouse was exactly what my family needed for a Christmas weekend getaway. Lara is am amazing hostess! She has thought of everything you may need! Not only was the farmhouse beautifully decorated but it was so much larger than the pictures give it credit for!!! Definitely a must see in person. Plenty of safe parking and easy check in and out. We felt right at home. My mom and son and I played games, watched Christmas movies, made s’mores at the fire pit, took walks and did crafts. No phones! (except for pictures) That was my favorite thing of all. We truly got to enjoy each other’s company. We cannot thank Eleanor’s and Lara enough for a perfect time.
My sister, mom and I had the most relaxing weekend at Eleanor's. The space is beautiful and Lara was a tremendous host. We will look forward to staying again sometime.☆☆☆☆☆
Great country get away! Super clean, very comfortable with many extra touches … like coffee, snacks and a welcome sign. Great communication with owner.

Just a lovely Oasis. It was closer to the highway than I thought it would be, which was weird at first but honestly wasn't very noticable during our stay. The house is so welcoming, Lara had water and ice in the fridge and snacks and spices ready. The leather couches in the living room are so comfy and the entertainment center is loaded with DVDs and games. The kitchen was easy to navigate.
I highly recommend driving South to Lyndon and visiting the Chapters bookstore and the coffee shop up the street. It added to our experience to have great food choices near the house. We ate at Buzzards Pizza and Cilantros.
We will be back to Eleanor's Farmhouse and I will recommend it to anyone who needs a quiet, cozy retreat.

My second time staying with Lara, my experience was just as good as the 1st. The home is very nice and well maintained, the priperty is fantastic, and the host, Lara, is very accommodating, and a super pleasure to work with. I will definitely be back! You will love it, guaranteed!
We have made multiple stays at this point and the house is always clean and communication is top notch. I’d highly recommend anyone in the area booking with Lara at Eleanor’s!

The farm house is everything you can tell from the listing and more! The photographs don’t do it justice. Great space with plenty of room if you are traveling with a few people. The inside is pristine and the kitchen is beautiful. Plenty of space outside too. It provides a great time to sit back and relax by the camp fire or take a walk around the property. The shower was warm and well pressured. Lara was quick to communicate with any questions we had. I would recommend a stay here and spend another night if I am back in town.

Everything was exactly as you’d expect. Clean, private and accommodating. My husband and I stayed here for a relaxing weekend and it was exactly what we needed! Fire pit was awesome as well as the walking trails and the house itself! Definitely recommend!

The house was amazing and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. House was clean and just as described. Quiet and beautiful location. Communication was top notch. Will definitely be staying here again in the near future.
Amazing you won’t be disappointed
Eleanor’s Farmhouse was such a neatly restored place. Very clean and the kitchen was well stocked. Lara’s communication was prompt and helpful. We highly recommend!

This is the perfect country stay. Quiet and country setting, with a wonderfully updated homestead. Beautiful inside, the bed was very comfy, and you can see all the stars. Next time I’m going to enjoy the fire pit and s’mores. 5/5 for sure!!

Elanor's is a charming farmhouse set in a country setting. The home is very neat and clean. The hostess Laura is wonderful! There really isn't anything she has not thought of, she has provided board games and books for rainy days along with comfortable chairs on the deck for sipping early morning coffee, a fire pit for roasting marshmallows, and Elanor's trail on the property for a short walk and family fun.

Lara was communicative and very helpful while planning my trip and was flexible with some last minutes changes. While we were here she was attentive and checked on us as a storm rolled through. We attended a wedding at Willow Creek and Laras place was perfect for us and minutes away. The home had everything we needed, off the main highway but private and a beautiful setting.
Perfect place to relax, lara really went above and beyond to make sure you have a great stay. Highly recommend!
The stay was great! Had everything we needed and more.

We had such a wonderful stay! The house is in the most beautiful location, surrounded by nature. The house itself is so cute and clean. Lara communicated great and we had no trouble finding the house. We would for sure stay here again in the future!
Comforting space, great communication, and the walking trail is lovely. Used the space for a girls’ night, but is also perfect for families, too!

This is a beautiful farmhouse. All necessities are provided, and it has a very homey feel. Even though it is right off the highway, it is so peaceful. Everything about our stay was seamless. I cannot wait to go back!
Wonderful place! It was our first stop on out road trip to the east coast! The kids had tons of fun playing games. The place was also super clean and very cute!

Came in for a race in Emporia. The house and yard are terrific for kids and adults. Lara was a terrific host. Very communicative and kind. We didn't make it there, but there is a state park with big beach and lake a few miles south. Looks fun.
This house is the perfect place for a weekend getaway with friends or a fun girls trip! We will definitely be back!
Great house to stay at!
Great host, wonderful clean bright cozy stay. Highly recommend to any family or singles. Beautiful decor and super clean. Will look forward to staying again
A hidden gem in a small town.... 5/5 experience worth every dollar
clean & charming. well-thought details and hospitality.
Such a cute little spot in the country not too far from the city. Great place to relax and unwind!

Eleanor’s is the perfect getaway for those looking to getaway from the sounds of the city but want to be close enough to hangout and shop in the city! The farm was absolutely beautiful and Lara is an amazing host. We can’t wait to stay here again!

We loved our stay at Eleanor’s! Lara was so responsive, the house was spacious and clean, and there were lots of fun details like games and toys for kids. Getting out of town to slow down, enjoy the outdoors and have time together as a family was exactly what we needed.
Lovely space, had a quick stop here. But had everything we needed.
Expect great communication, a SUPER clean home with a relaxing atmosphere!

We LOVED our stay here and wished we could have stayed longer! The interior had all the girls gasping at how perfect and beautiful it was. It was a great little farm-nook to tuck ourselves into for a day, and Lara was such a sweet host! Stay here! You won't be disappointed!

We loved our stay at Eleanors! We arrived late at the house and Lara had turned on the furnaces and lights around the house so we wouldn’t walk into a cold, dark, unknown house and when we walked in there was a sign welcoming our family. We all thought that was an awesome gesture! The house was cute and cozy. We felt safe and at home there. Lara was so easy to communicate with and respected our privacy. The family games provided were a nice added touch. The lighted fire pit area was awesome. My family enjoyed walking the trails around the property. There were no houses on either side of the Eleanors so you had complete privacy. We would definitely stay here again if in the area and would recommend to everyone to stay there!
Cute farmhouse, responsive host, great stay.
Lara’s house is a gorgeous get away from the busy everyday life.
Eleanor’s was beautiful. We especially enjoyed the fire pit out back and the pretty walking trails. We had a lovely stay and hope to come again.

What a thoughtfully, well appointed country cabin. Definitely, Joanne Gain's inspired. Sara needs to come to my house and help me redecorate! Eleanor's has everything you need to uncoil from the stressors of life. This was one of the most comfortable airbnb's I've had the pleasure of staying in. This says a lot, because I only stay in homes when I travel. I love the airbnb experience... I highly recommend Eleanor's to couples, families and all weary travelers. Peace and comfort resides at Eleanor's. Thank you...

Lara's space was the perfect respite on my long car journey cross country. Situated right off the main highway and well lighted with large directional signs, I had no problem finding it in the dark. Lara was SUPER responsive, which I always appreciate -especially when traveling alone!

We fell in love with Eleanor's farm house as soon as we walked in. It has been well updated while holding on to the country charm. The grounds are very nice and we look forward to visiting when the weather allows us to take advantage of them. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay !

Heidi was amazing. We had to cancel another airbnb the day before our get together and Heidi was incredibly understanding and proactive about our last second booking. She made sure the place was clean, we had everything we needed for our stay, gave clear instructions, and she was extremely kind throughout. The space was absolutely breathtaking. We made good use of the fire pits and smores sticks. The house was so comfortable and luxurious, and the property was just gorgeous. Most of us went on individual walks on some of the trails. It was very serene. This stay was everything we needed and to think it all came together last second is just mind boggling. We are so lucky to have found Heidi and we will absolutely be back at some point.

This was an amazing stay at a beautiful home! My friends and I had so much fun together and we’re blessed to have such a lovely home to celebrate the new year together in. Heidi was more than amazing and helpful! ❤️

The entire stay exceeded expectations! We used it for a leadership retreat. The setting is perfect for getting away and enjoying creation and yet provides all the amenities that are important for spending a weekend as a small group or a larger group. The outdoor amenities (fire pit, outdoor games, seating, land, trails…) only add to this delightful location. It is clean, quality furnishings, plenty of space. The owner was exceptionally responsive, proactive, and increased our confidence in our decision before we arrived. I HIGHLY recommend!

This place is truly magical! From the moment you pull into the property you feel the most amazing energy, it’s so peaceful! While it's true that traveling always accompanies a sense of adventure and the wonder in discovery of new things, one fact is unavoidable: Staying in someone else's house--or even a hotel--never feels like home.
However, the hosts of The Hickory House have gone so far above and beyond expectations, familiar is nearer than it typically is in a VRBO setting. Listing everything would require pages and pages of accolades, but we'll relate some highlights here. This lovely home is stocked with just about everything you can possibly need--not only for a place to sleep and shower, but even for gatherings as well.
All the quotidian, expected accoutrements are easily present: hand soap, sanitizer, extra toilet paper, coffee, tea, creamer, sugar. But we also found a glut of additions which easily go overlooked when not provided.
Our mattress was clearly not a third hand-me-down from your cousin's guest room, guaranteed to leave you in pain the next day: we slept quite comfortably in the room that is most likely not considered the master bedroom (we selected it to be in the front of the house).
We didn't cook while we were here, but the basics are at our disposal as well, with a teakettle, plenty of dishes, pans, casserole dishes, cooking oil, a few basic spices, aluminum foil, blender, toaster, microwave, and three coffee makers--small/large standard drips and a Keurig. A fire extinguisher in the kitchen illustrates so well how thoroughly everything is planned.
One of the first things we noticed was the dining table, quaintly set in a welcoming arrangement. There was a basket of snacks and a stack of local restaurant menus and pamphlets describing local attractions. We unfortunately didn't get a photo--it was lovely before we ate lunch, displacing everything.
The house was clearly built in the early 20th century, and it retains all the charm from that time. However, there are just enough modern upgrades to make the stay practical. A remodeled shower and toilet top the list, because really... quaint is beautiful until you're actually using that Sears catalog for "other" progress and missing technological progress.
Other contemporary essentials include
5GHz (and 2.4) WiFi
and this reporter's favorite: a *wired* connection, for when additional security is needed (e.g. banking or remote work)
digital thermostat, super easy to use
A flat screen TV, probably 45" (though we never turned it on)
power strips, outlet expanders, and extension cords (those old houses don't have many outlets--but the Hickory House has you covered)
A few unexpected things we found as pleasant surprises:
a coat tree just inside the door
folding chairs
umbrellas
about a million towels
plenty of drawers and dresser space
a flashlight
feminine products
basic medical, e.g. Tums, Tylenol, Ibuprofen, band-aids, allergy pills
zip lock sandwich bags
extra face masks
